channel.title: Peoples on Math and Data
channel.description: Recent content in Peoples on Math and Data

item.title: Faculty
item.description: Core #### [Joan Bruna](http://www.cims.nyu.edu/~bruna/) Assistant Professor, Department of Computer Science, Center for Data Science and Mathematics (affiliated). #### [Carlos Fernandez-Granda](http://www.cims.nyu.edu/~cfgranda/) Assistant Professor, Department of Mathematics and Center for Data Science. #### [Julia Kempe](http://www.cims.nyu.edu/~kempe/) Professor, Department of Mathematics, Computer Science and Center for Data Science. #### [Jonathan Niles-Weed](http://jonathannilesweed.com) Assistant Professor, Department of Mathematics and Center for Data Science. Afiliated Gerard Ben Arous Professor, Mathematics, Courant Institute.

item.title: PhD/MsC Students
item.description: PhD Students #### [Brett Bernstein](https://cims.nyu.edu/~brettb/) (Sept 2014 - ) #### [David Brandfonbrener](https://davidbrandfonbrener.github.io/) (Sept 2018 - ) #### Zhengdao Chen (Sept 2018 - ) #### Carles Domingo (Sept 2019 - ) #### [Samy Jelassi](https://sjelassi.github.io) (Sept 2018 - ) #### [Aakash Kaku](https://aakashrkaku.github.io/ ) (Sept 2019 - ) #### [Tim Kunisky](http://www.kunisky.com) (Sept 2017 - ) #### [Sheng Liu](https://cims.nyu.edu/~sl5924/index.html) (Sept 2019 - ) #### Kangning Liu (Sept 2019 - ) #### Sreyas Mohan (Sept 2018 - ) #### [Karl Otness](https://www.

item.title: Postdocs and Fellows
item.description: #### [Yossi Arjevani](https://scholar.google.co.il/citations?user=mgVLJ8MAAAAJ&hl=en) (Sept 2019 - ) Postdoc, Center for Data Science; optimization, machine learning. #### [Léo Miolane](https://leomiolane.github.io/) (Sept 2019 - ) Postdoc, Department of Mathematics and Center for Data Science; probability, statistics. #### [Qing Qu](https://qingqu06.github.io/) (Sept 2018 - ) CDS Moore-Sloan Fellow; signal processing, machine learning, optimization. #### [Grant Rotskoff](https://cims.nyu.edu/~rotskoff/index.html) (Sept 2017 - ) Postdoc, Courant Institute; statistical mechanics, machine learning. #### [Matthew Trager](https://www.matthewtrager.com) (Sept 2018 - ) Postdoc, Center for Data Science; algebraic geometry, deep learning.
